Summary: I WAS TAKING A PICTURE OF A CLOUD. I DIDN'T SEE THE OBJECT TILL I UPLOADED THE PICTURE TO MY COMPUTER
divs: Sighting Details I WAS SITTING AT A SUNOCO GAS STATION AND NOTICED A CLOUD I THOUGHT WAS NEAT AND DECIDED TO TAKE A PICTURE OF IT. I DIDN'T SEE ANYTHING ELSE UNTILL I GOT HOME AND UPLOADED THE PICTURES TO MY COMPUTER. WHILE VIEWING THE PICTURES I SAW A BLACK DOT ON THE PICTURE. I CHECKED MY LENSE TO SEE IF THERE WAS DIRT ON IT OR A SPOT AND THERE WASN'T. I ENLARGED THE SECTION WHERE THE DOT WAS AND THATS WHEN I SAW THE OBJECT WAS OVAL IN SHAPE. I DECIDED TO SEE IF I COULD SEND THE PICTURES TO YOU TO ANALIZE TO DETERMINE WHAT IT IS. PLEASE E-MAIL ME IF YOU WANT ME TO SEND THE PICTURES VIA EMAIL. I HAVE NOT PRINTED THE PICTURES AS I DO NOT HAVE PHOTO PAPER AND INK FOR MY PRINTER.
